entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming east 30 km/h near noon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Forecast issued 06:54 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 30 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 06:54 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022
